article_title: The best iPhone 16e cases: Top picks for protecting your new phone
summary: The article discusses the best iPhone 16e cases that offer durability, practicality, and style, suitable for use with Qi wireless charging. It provides recommendations from top brands like Zagg, Otterbox, and Spigen. The Zagg Crystal Palace Snap case is highlighted as the top pick, while the Spigen Tough Armor case is suggested as a budget-friendly option with raised edges for screen and camera protection. It emphasizes the importance of using a high-quality case to protect the iPhone 16e, which lacks MagSafe technology, and suggests considering factors such as protection level, functionality, and compatibility with magnetic accessories and wireless charging. It also notes that cases designed for the iPhone 16 will not fit the iPhone 16e due to differences in design and dimensions.
